Package amuse.data.io

Interface Summary
DataInputInterface All AMUSE data inputs (memory objects or links to files) should implement this interface
 

Class Summary
ArffDataSet DataSet is used to represent data vectors in Amuse and is closely related to the ARFF file format, developed by the University of Waikato.
DataSet DataSet contains different attributes with values
DataSetAbstract  
DataSetInput AMUSE data input as DataSet
FileInput AMUSE input which is saved in a singular file
FileListInput AMUSE input which is saved in a list of files
 

Exception Summary
DataSetException DataSetException indicates invalid usage of DataSet and Attribute Classes.
